title: Game keeps freezing between min 19 and min 20.
body:
Hello guys,

i got a problem with league of legends for about 2 weeks now. It keeps freezing ingame between min 19 and 20, not always at the same time but always in this 1 min. It just freezes and I have to kill it with the task manager to close it and reconnect afterwards. I already went through everything of the [Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) but it didnt really helped. It doesnt matter if I run it in fullscreen, borderless-fullscreen or windowed.

Here are my specs: https://www.dropbox.com/s/5yu6q884l4fgel9/specs.txt?dl=0


Thanks in advance

mono

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  There's been an issue where an update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which caused freezing for some players.  Try disabling that in addition to the guide you went over.  Test it out in a custom and let me know if it works!
Yeah i am on Windows 10 and i already disabled it, since it is the last part of the troubleshooting. Sadly it didn't help.

Oh what, I didn't know that was added to the guide- thanks for the heads up and for trying out the steps.  In this case, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look individually.

Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to obtain some logs, and attach it to the ticket for context.  We'll get back to you!
